attributes.action: To establish a Royal Commission on Education in England  and Wales.
attributes.additional_details:
The present education system has been so meddled with, and grossly underfunded in the public sector, that it is now incoherent and incapable of achieving appropriate goals.

We ask that a Royal Commission be set up to:-

a) investigate and articulate aims and purposes of education in E & W including meeting national, economic, employment, professional and global needs and achieving individuals' abilities and skills;

b) propose systems and structures i) to provide this education and ii) to assess the successes of both individual students and the organisations and institutions providing the learning experiences; and

c) propose funding arrangements to meet the costs arising.
